title: Chinese chicken and sweetcorn stir fry
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons corn or vegetable oil', '2 slices fresh ginger, minced', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '3 skinless, boneless chicken thighs, diced', '1 tin sweetcorn, drained', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', '1/4 red pepper, sliced', '2 spring onions, sliced', '1/2 teaspoon salt, or to taste', '1/4 teaspoon chicken stock granules, or to taste']
